medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient noticed churning abdominal pain in his RUQ 5 days prior to presentation, a few hours after dinner. Pain was severe enough to cause sleeplessness but resolved a few hours later. It recurred with associated nausea, lasting more than 6 hours. He experienced loss of appetite and last ate a few bites of pasta salad yesterday, after which he stopped eating.
medical_history.past_medical_history: IBS, pancreatic insufficiency, history of inguinal hernia repair, open, with mesh
